articles.title: The Sharp U.S. Pivot to Asia Is Throwing Europe Off Balance - The New York Times
articles.description: The new U.S. alliance with Australia and Britain against China has put Europe closer to a question it has tried to avoid: Which side are you on?
articles.content: There are deeper questions about Americas future reliability as a security partner, especially if the conflict with China turns kinetic, which is part of Mr. Macrons argument, Mr. Lesser acknowledged… [+1795 chars]
